title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 351.4 - Method of computing percentage of impairment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 351.4 - Method of computing percentage of impairment

State Regulations

For every decibel that the average hearing level of an ear
exceeds 25 dB, allow 1 1/2 percent up to a maximum of 100 percent. That maximum
is reached at 92 decibels. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
351.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
